decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Adopted Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Policies B1, H8, Replacement UDP Policy 4.1. | The flat roof to be created shall not be used to form a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area.  REASON:	To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with Adopted Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Policy H33, Replacement UDP Policy 5.5. | The proposed metal grille at first floor level shall be permanently fixed to the rear elevation as indicated on the drawings and shall not project beyond the rear elevation.  REASON:   In the interests of visual amenity and to ensure that a barrier is maintained to prevent use of the flat roof as a balcony in accordance with the provision of condition 3  above, in accordance with Adopted Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Policy H33, Replacement UDP Policy 5.5.
description: Single storey side and rear extension to house and metal grille to first floor rear bedroom French doors
